PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-06292015-05-28,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Accelerated Capital Cost Allowance for Facilities Used to Liquefy Natural Gas)
PrecisRegulations Amending THE INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (ACCELERATED CAPITAL COST ALLOWANCE FOR FACILITIES USED TO LIQUEFY NATURAL GAS) in order to build on existing advantages and make it more attractive to build facilities that liquefy natural gas in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0117 Publication Date: 2015-06-17
